content: seven-inch bear in the round with raglan sleeves this bear is knit in the round from the top down sleeves are created by increasing at each of the arms and then placing stitches on waste yarn once they total 12 stitches then the body is knit in the round proceeding to the lower torso or pants which splits to form two legs held stitches are placed back on needles and knit in the round for arms and paws finishing includes stu cid 431 ing cinching legs and arms and embroidering a face directions measure length in inches for each segment of the bear rather than in round counts so knitters can adjust to a maximum total of 7 for bear length for bears with limb di cid 431 erence i e amputee bears make one arm or leg shorter finished bear dimensions longer-waisted shorter-waisted head 2 2 shirt 2 1 5 pants with feet 3 3 5 arms 2 2 total length 7 7 dimensions for the shorter-waisted bear are in parentheses materials dk or worsted like plymouth encore or cascade 220 superwash heavier worsted yarn will make a wider bear and require fewer row 25 yards for head/paws/feet 20 yards for shirt 20 yards for pants needle size us6/4 0mm june 29 2025 1 seven-inch bear in the round with raglan sleeves head body and legs 1 cast on 36 stitches in head color using judy s magic cast on mark the beginning of the round for additional cast on methods see the notes section2 knit around until head measures 2 change to shirt color knit one row and place markers as follows k1 pm k16 pm k2 pm k16 pm k1 note that the bor marker is in the middle of the arm begin arm increases row 1 knit to one stitch before marker kfb sm knit to 2nd marker sm kfb knit to 1 stitch before 3rd marker kfb sm knit to 4th marker sm kfb knit to end of round 4 sts increased 16 sts each front and back 4 sts each sleeve 40 sts total continue row 1 until you have 12 sts for each sleeve 16 sts each front and back 56 sts total divide body and sleeve stitches knit to 2nd marker place 12 stitches for the sleeve on waste yarn cast on 2 stitches underarm stitches knit to the 4th marker place 12 stitches for sleeve on waste yarn cast on 2 stitches place bor marker between the two cast on stitches 18 sts each front and back 36 sts total knit around until shirt measures 2 1 5 change to pants color knit around until pants measure approximately 1 legs next row split total of 36 stitches in two 18 for each leg attach a separate yarn to the second leg for knitting in the round each leg separately knit legs in the round switching to foot/shoe color for the last 3-4 rounds knit until pants with feet measure 3
